s1title: Decentralized Porn Studio in Hollywood with a Unified Adult-Industry Cryptocurrency
s1card2:

s3vogovtitle: is a game-changing way to participate in porn
s3vogovdesc: VogoV is an already-functioning adult entertainment studio based in Los Angeles that produces and distributes high-quality content in 4k and 60fps as well as VR videos. Within our studio, the decision-making process around the production of adult videos is decentralized. This means every token holder can vote on the content being produced. Scenarios, participating actors and actresses, and other aspects of production will be voted on within the voting charter.
s3videoblock2title: OGO coin is a ground-breaking way to pay for porn
s3videoblock2desc: OGO coin is a unified adult-industry cryptocurrency with a $3 million liquidity pool to ensure its business-use proliferation. OGO coin is an anonymous and secure way to pay for adult goods and services without intermediaries. To ensure a strong uptake in the use of OGO coin, VogoV is developing the cryptocurrency infrastructure called OgoShift.
s4title2: Enjoy the token’s benefits as soon as you buy it
s4desc: When the crowdsale starts, OGO coin can be used on VogoV.com and its partners immediately
s5desc: OGO coin consists of economic, economical, and community values
s5text1: Community Value: Our token offers token holders the opportunity to take part in the decentralized decision-making process within the production of adult at VogoV.com. Each OGO coin is a vote for the content the token holders really want to watch.
s5text2: Economic Value: OGO coin is a unified adult-industry cryptocurrency. Its market circulation is backed by a $3 million liquidity pool and a burn mechanism. The OGO coin will be widely accepted by industry players as a payment method due to our partnership arrangements.
s5text3: Economical Value: Our token provides token holders with membership and pay-per-view access to VogoV.com, TeenMegaWorld.net and TmwVRnet.com that is three times cheaper than paying with fiat currency.
s7desc1: In order to stabilize the token market price in case it drops lower than its crowdsale price, OGO coins sold back and stored in VogoV wallets are burned.
s7desc2: OGO coin’s acceptance and business-use proliferation is based on strong partnerships and a liquidity pool of $3 million. The partners can offer their goods and services for OGO coin and exchange received OGO coins for fiat currencies at VogoV’s liquidity pool.
s9desc: Supporting widespread cryptocurrency usage in the adult industry
s9b1: 1. Cryptocurrency acceptance without processing fees. Offers fixed-amount, time-recurring and pay-per-view payments
s9b3: 3. Smooth exchange of crypto and fiat currencies
s9b4: 4. Targeted marketing and distribution channel for services and goods sold for cryptocurrencies
s9c1: 1. Easy to purchase adult goods and services with cryptocurrency
s9c2: 2. Convenient, targeted search for goods and services which can be purchased with cryptocurrencies
s10title: Be Sure You Don’t Miss the Boat
s10desc: Joining the waitlist enters you into a lottery for a chance to win an amazing prize. After the first crowdsale round, VogoV studio is holding an exclusive party in Los Angeles. 10 waitlisted token buyers will be invited to attend, with free flights and accommodations. It is a great opportunity to meet a ton of popular porn stars and famous producers.
s11desc: The pre-crowdsale and the first round of the crowdsale are held on smart contracts, which will be published within three weeks
s12desc: The crowdsale is divided into bonus sections according to the amount of OGO coins sold
s13desc: Project implementation depends on the amount of OGO coins sold

s15bridgdesc: Bridgette B is a popular actress and model who is also known as the Spanish Doll. Porn sites all over the world list Bridgette B as one of the top porn stars. Bridgette advises VogoV on how to attract more industry stars in order to create a pool of performers whom our voters can choose during the voting process.
s15roccosoc: Legendary Actor and Director as well as Markus Dupree’s Mentor
s15roccodesc: Rocco Siffredi is a legend in porn. Everyone who likes porn has seen Rocco Siffredi. He has won over 40 AVN awards («the Oscars of Porn») and has starred in almost 1400 adult films. Rocco Siffredi has vast industry experience and advises us on video production and studio management matters.
s16markusdesc: Markus Dupree is the stage name of Aleksei Maetnyi, a performer who has won 7 AVN awards:
s16darkkodesc: Jonni Darkko is a well-known figure in the adult entertainment industry and has over 20 years of experience as both a former male performer and a director. Having directed over 180 porn videos, he was inducted into the AVN Hall of Fame in 2016. Jonni Darkko is in charge of video shooting at VogoV.
